Package net.evmodder.DropHeads.events

Class HeadRollEvent

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.event.Event
org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityEvent
net.evmodder.DropHeads.events.HeadRollEvent
public class HeadRollEvent extends org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityEvent
Event created by DropHeads (v3.7+) to indicate that a head drop roll has occurred and the success/failure has been determined. This event allows you to analyze and modify the drop chance success. If the success of this event is set to false, no head will be dropped; if it is set to true, a head will be dropped.

  • Constructor Details

    • HeadRollEvent

      public HeadRollEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Entity killer, org.bukkit.entity.Entity victim, double dropChance, double dropRoll, boolean dropSuccess)
      Create a HeadRollEvent for DropHeads.
      Parameters:
      killer - the Entity doing the beheading
      victim - the Entity being beheaded
      dropChance - the configured droprate for the victim's head, between 0 and 1 inclusive
      dropRoll - the PRNG double drop roll value, between 0 and 1 inclusive
      dropSuccess - whether the drop roll was determined successful.

    • getDropRoll

      public double getDropRoll()
      Get the PRNG value of the drop roll, uniform between 0 and 1 inclusive. When this value is lower than the droprate, the roll is considered successful.
      Returns:
      the drop roll value in the range [0, 1]

    • getDropSuccess

      Returns:
      the success of the drop roll
